title: Ranked preference emblem help
body: I've played nearly 90% of my ranked games solo queue, and i received a "Dynamic Preference" emblem rather than a solo one? Any information as to why this happened would be appreciated, thanks.

replies.body:
Ranked Emblems are decided from the last 25 ranked games played. Generally, to get a solo emblem, the vast majority of your last 25 matches need to have been played solo. The emblem can change over time, but you'll need to play a lot of solo games compared to dynamic ones. Complete info on this system can be found in our [Ranked Emblems FAQ. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems)

Let me know if you have questions.

As a side note, the news http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dynamic-queue-matchmaking-update says that the threshold for Solo emblem is *exactly* 90%. (Though I have my doubts, because Ghostcrawler also mentioned somewhere else that the size of premades were also taken into account, but he didn't detail how.)

So if you are at "nearly 90%", you're almost there ;)
The solo emblem is for players who pretty much only solo queue.  If you play with premades even in a few games it will shift the emblem you get.
